determineWinner

User determineWinner(CommunityCards cc,
                     java.util.ArrayList<User> allGameUsers)
Determine the game winner. Takes all the game users, then analyses their hands in order to figure out who has won.

Parameters:
cc - the community cards
allGameUsers - the all game users
Returns:
the user who is the winner
